main event: The observer sighted a bright whitish-yellow light that traveled in an erratic course, had an erratic speed, and disappeared.
interesting points: The description is consistent with that of a garment bag hot air balloon.
The observer could not think of any possible German object or meteor that could explain the sighting.
The observer was an amateur astronomer.
The observer reported the sighting to the Director's Office, possibly in 1969.
The observer sketched a diagram of the sighted object and its path.
